Node.definition: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= bright golden yellow flower, growing with several flowers on one stem; ◄ Narcissus tazetta; ≈ symbol of beauty
= plain; ◄ along the coast of the Mediterranean

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
= the area separating two or mores locations
= plant with thorns; ► useless; ≈ regarded as ugly and useless
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 10 meters; it has a rounded crown, and bears a round fruit about the size of an orange; in the spring the tree is completely covered with pink flowers, which gradually give way to the green of the leaves as they develop; the fruit can be greenish, yellow, or red. ◄ Malus sylvestris; ► considered both beautiful and refreshing
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= people of relatively young age
= process by which humans or deities experience an eager desire for a person or object
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= state in which food tastes well
= process by which humans discover the flavor of food; ≈ associated with the palate

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= piece of cloth that is raised on a pole; ► symbolizes the identity of a group of people, and helps to keep the group together; ≈ associated with security
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= action by which humans or deities keep (other) humans from falling or collapsing by taking hold of them
= cake; ◄ made of dried, compressed grapes; ► possibly eaten at festivals and other special ceremonies

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 10 meters; it has a rounded crown, and bears a round fruit about the size of an orange; in the spring the tree is completely covered with pink flowers, which gradually give way to the green of the leaves as they develop; the fruit can be greenish, yellow, or red. ◄ Malus sylvestris; ► considered both beautiful and refreshing

Node.gloss: to be, become weak|to be, become powerless|to be sick|to be injured
Node.definition: = process by which humans lose their physical strength ◄ as a result of sickness, injury, a prolonged exertion of strength, or other circumstances
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= the side of the human body which is to the north when facing the direction of the rising sun; in extension: one option as opposed to another

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= action by which humans put their arms around someone else ► as a greeting, a sign of affection, or during love making
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to make (someone) swear|to put (someone) under oath|to adjure
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= female of אַיָּל (אַיָּל)

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

Node.gloss: to rouse|to stir up|to raise|to stoke
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone causes an event to start taking place, ◄ as if it had been dormant or inactive for a certain time
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

Node.gloss: to rouse|to stir up|to raise|to stoke
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone causes an event to start taking place, ◄ as if it had been dormant or inactive for a certain time

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= affection between people, or between people and deities
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= action by which someone moves forward at a relatively high speed while jumping over any obstacles on the way
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= action by which animals move speedily by jumping over any obstacle that they find in their way
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)

Node.gloss: to be like|to be comparable to|to resemble
Node.definition: = process by which the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities is measured
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a young male fallow deer (אַיָּל) ≈ associated with beauty

= wild animal, standing about a meter high, that ruminates, and of which the male grows antlers, which are dropped every year; has a reddish fur with white spots during summer; during winter the white spots disappear and the coat becomes darker; ◄ belongs to family of cervidae; ► clean animal and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with strength, speed, and agility; the male is also associated with sexual prowess
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= flat vertical construction, ◄ made of stone, sometimes with wooden supports, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space
= action by which humans or deities fix their eyes on an object for a prolonged period of time

= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy
= action by which humans fix their eyes on an object for a prolonged period of time
= structure of cross laths with interstices ◄ in a door or window
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= water that has fallen as rain|= process by which an event runs its course and comes to an end
literally: to go away; hence: = process by which event stop happening
= flowers on a tree or bush

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= action by which one expresses utters words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not|= causative action by which someone cuts away or cuts back unproductive branches so that they can produce better
literally: to reach; hence: = process by which a certain event reaches the time for it to take place

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree
= causative action by which plants form fruits
= fruit of the fig (תְּאֵנָה) tree, of the variety that ripens early (in June); ► appreciated because of their fine flavor

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
= area that is difficult to reach, ◄ located within mountains or rocks, ► which people may use as a temporary or permanent dwelling place; ≈ and is regarded as relatively safe
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them
= a steep or vertical rock face
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which food tastes well and is considered desirable food; can be extended to refer to other things besides food
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)

= animal that looks like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; ≈ associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self important

= animal that looks like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; ≈ associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self important
= state in which animate or inanimate objects are relatively small in size, ≈ which is sometimes associated with a lack of strength, and with insignificance

Node.gloss: to destroy|to ruin|to devastate|to break|to harm
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone brings destruction and suffering upon humans and inanimate objects
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= action by which humans, supernatural beings, forces of nature, or other objects face a direction different from the one they were facing before

Node.gloss: to be like|to be comparable to|to resemble
Node.definition: = process by which the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities is measured

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a young male fallow deer (אַיָּל) ≈ associated with beauty

= wild animal, standing about a meter high, that ruminates, and of which the male grows antlers, which are dropped every year; has a reddish fur with white spots during summer; during winter the white spots disappear and the coat becomes darker; ◄ belongs to family of cervidae; ► clean animal and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with strength, speed, and agility; the male is also associated with sexual prowess
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
meaning unsure: possibly: = state in which an object looks as if it has been divided into two|meaning unsure; possibly: = a group of mountains with many ravines
